website_summaries.verdict: A great example of a Windows-based smartphone and a killer option for what it costs, although there's still not quite enough going on with Windows Phone to pull people away from Android or iOS.
pros: Smart-looking with satisfying mid-range power, the Lumia 830 packs in more features than you'd expect at this price range, including the impressive PureView camera
cons: A 720p screen seems a little disappointing on anything with the title 'flagship'
Windows, as always, suffers when it comes to your choice of apps in the marketplace

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Windows Phone I've owned (first was the 635 that I bought to test out the Windows OS on a phone to see if I liked it), and I'm loving it. This phone does get LTE coverage with T-Mobile and AT&T in the US as long as you get the the RM 985 variant. I'm with T-Mobile and my phone got LTE coverage right out of the box. Make sure you ask the seller if they have the 985 variant of this phone. I bought mine from FoneGuru here on Amazon after confirming that they were selling the 985 version. I guess FoneGuru is sold out at the moment, but hopefully they will get more in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Less than five months...GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months or less of using this phone it has gone to the dogs Firsly,the listening app come on on it's own without being activated Secondly it began to dial on it own last straw when I call no one can hear me. I am wondering whether I got a new phone or this phone is just garbage
customer_reviews.author: Bec2Bec

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent phone for the money. It is solidly built and very light. I won't go into the details about WP 8, 8.1 or 10 as there are plenty of opinions regarding that selection of OS already. Things I like about it 1. The screen is very easy on the eyes. It provides good resolution for it's size and the colors are very natural overall. 2. This phone is extremely easy to hold onto while using 3. Call volume is excellent via headset, speaker phone and Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: R. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Used and Abused
customer_reviews.text: The phone was used. I thought I was going to get a new phone because of the pictures showed. I got a phone that was banged up, scratched and worn down. Really disappointed...The back part of the phone, where the battery goes, was very loose. This was a gift to my step dad so I was pretty down after what we got. Didn't say the phone was used.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: great window phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing I love it! It has a really smooth a interface. I I prefer it over Android and Apple phones. It has a great 11 mega pixel camera with lots of options you can mess with to get the perfect shot. Great call quality and yes it work great with straight talk! Only con it dose not have that many apps
customer_reviews.author: luis reza

customer_reviews.title: It will not sync up to my car blue tooth not sure why so a bit disappointed. Will do better research next time
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the latest Microsoft version of this phone but it is not. It will not sync up to my car blue tooth not sure why so a bit disappointed. Will do better research next time.
customer_reviews.author: MF Minnis

customer_reviews.title: ... phone continually wants me to provide feedback via an annoying popup and I cannot limit background data
customer_reviews.text: The phone continually wants me to provide feedback via an annoying popup and I cannot limit background data, I have to turn data off otherwise the phone will use 400 meg in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was not as fragile
customer_reviews.text: There's a work around to put windows 10 on this. Camera is incredibly nice. Nice design. Screen stopped working (black) within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great Features; Slim and Slick
customer_reviews.text: Great Features; Slim and Slick, fast, great graphics and sound is great.! I HAVE ONLY one dislike and that is the location of the power-bottom. NEED TO GET USED TO NOT ACCIDENTLY TURNING ON AND OFF THE PHONE.. .. OTHERWISE SOFAR IT'S A GREAT PHONE WINDOWS BASED.. I DON'T LIKE ANDROIDS, IT'S MUCH EASIER TO CONTROL A WINDOW PHONE..
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: The phone description was on point but what most importantly ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone description was on point but what most importantly took away from this is the fact that it was factory locked to AT&T; and now instead of enjoying the phone with the network of my choice, I have to be ending up paying more to unlock the phone. Still am struggling to get this unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: Not the phone I needed
customer_reviews.text: Not the phone I wanted to replace my phone that eventually sent out for repair Will gladly return because I never activated the Nokia 830
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected, without all the extra software
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone. I've always liked Nokia (Now Microsoft) products, and as usual, this device is solidly built. Note that the phone is built for the international market so it comes with none of the additional software that is loaded on the handset that comes from AT&T or Verizon as branding. Yes, apps are still a little sparse on Windows phones, but that is improving.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M.

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with purchase, been a windows phone fan, and seems like they just keep betting better. would recommend to all and sundry :)
customer_reviews.author: jer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, doesn't feel cheap rather premium. I upgraded it with no problems to Windows 10 and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: eruin j castillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the price, fast, reliable and featured loaded, I made the switch from Android to Windows and I'm not looking back. Super happy with my new phone
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone - no iHeartRadio
customer_reviews.text: Solid phone. No LTE on ATT. One other random thing to consider. For some reason, the popular app iHeartRadio is not available specifically for this model. Otherwise, a great device!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Penn

customer_reviews.title: the phone is great - but after few month we could not use ...
customer_reviews.text: the phone is great - but after few month we could not use it without headphones - the inner speaker did not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone for every thing but you need to check ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for every thing but you need to check the Gmail app when you open it its show you half of the writing And the app not useful right now I save a web page to use it as I use the same app on Android phone and iPhone I wish you could do better for this situation And the 830 really its good 😊 phone thank you
customer_reviews.author: Waleed

customer_reviews.title: Terrible surprise
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone, however I think the seller should add in the description the bands this phone uses for 2G, 3G and LTE
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Dangers of buying non-US phone in US
customer_reviews.text: the phone itself is great, all the good reviews are correct. Win Phone is very sweet, when it works - but, the capacitive buttons stop responding after 6 month and nothing will restore their function. tried factory reset, latest updates etc.. And with the phone being non-US version, there is no microsoft warranty on it :( Now searching for a independent repair facility that can fix it or tell me its not fixable. p.s. screw you T-Mobile for not having this phone in US.
customer_reviews.author: KGBMan

customer_reviews.title: Sweet spot Windows phone
customer_reviews.text: Great tradeoff between performance/features and price. 16Gb internal memory is key since many apps will not work with SD (such as WhatsApp)
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken camera lens. Description did not match product, was not in new condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working about 2 weeks after I bought it !!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: what a crap -_-
customer_reviews.text: After just 2 months of use, there is no way to get it working with a SIM-Card, what a crap -_-
customer_reviews.author: Schlapps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone I love it !! big screen !!!!! :D im so happy with this phone !
customer_reviews.author: HUMBERTO HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: only had it a day and loving it works nice feels fast and runs everything I have thrown at ...
customer_reviews.text: only had it a day and loving it works nice feels fast and runs everything I have thrown at it
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Stamps

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone. The only issue was the original setup ...
customer_reviews.text: Great smartphone. The only issue was the original setup language (Chinese).
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jose Zangaro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. I got on a very good deal from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this phone is exactly what I wanted, Thank you :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update to 5-stars
customer_reviews.text: Although the phone was flawless, I read so many different web write-ups that I mistakenly read this one as unlocked. Then I dinged them for it. Not cool on my part.
customer_reviews.author: War Wizard

customer_reviews.title: No 4G
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the phone is ok, but it does not support 4G, so I have a phone that does not have internet. Try sending a message to the seller but no response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Randika Ekanayake

customer_reviews.title: Can not use 4G.
customer_reviews.text: Only one thing not good is , the phone can not use 4G network but the seller say nothing about that.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Lo

customer_reviews.title: was not very good buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: They sold as refurbished, but it is a used phone and no operating manual or original charger, finally, was not very good buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone midrange price with high end feel wafer thin,sd slot ,wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: John bracken

customer_reviews.title: camera not working!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most important features advertised; the back camera does not work at all. No pictures can be taken????
customer_reviews.author: J. C

customer_reviews.title: best phone ive had so far.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Lumia 830. I had this same phone when it was brand new in 2014 but broke the screen. And moved onto the HTC one m8. Had that until Microsoft decided not to support HTC for Windows 10. So I then went to amazon I bought this phone. It may be three years old but it's the best one I've had so far. Oh, and in the description it says that you won't be able to get 4g one it because it's an international phone, but I get 4g.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P.

customer_reviews.title: i love the size and the fact that it is light ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone i must say, i love the size and the fact that it is light weight. I bought international version and received the AT&T version instead came with a wireless charging back and a normal one in the back which is a plus from the seller for me. i am still in love with it though, i am still not happy i have not been able to upgrade it to Windows 10 as described on several tech websites. Over all quality in terms of Sound, Camera, Internet Speeds and Usability, i am satisfied. all the basic apps i need for work are availalble for free so i am good with it over all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ebipabo Fred

customer_reviews.title: Sreen detachs after short use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Sept 13th,2015. Works great on the AT&T network. This weekend I noticed the front screen is detaching from the body. The phone is still working but it appears that the screen will completely detach soon. The repair cost $179.00. This phone has not been neglected and is in a protective case, other than the detaching screen it looks brand new. The phone is not under warranty and I understood that when I purchased the phone however, after five months of use I don't expect the screen to be detaching.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P. Cronley

customer_reviews.title: lime green, spray painted black?
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great! everything is crystal clear, perfect. Exactly what you would expect for a perfectly working phone. -1 star because it's not black. It's the green back spray painted black - which looks nice, but as soon as I went to open the back to put the battery in, paint chipped off to reveal the lime green. I don't care because I am putting a case on the phone so you can't see it and i'll never take the case off. But if you plan on using the phone without a case (which I do not recommend in any way), just know you're not going to have a black plastic cover on the back for long.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Downing

customer_reviews.title: The camera takes great pictures and low light isn't a problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought from eKings and the phones were definitely the right model. They are working well and are lighter than we expected. The camera takes great pictures and low light isn't a problem. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LRo

customer_reviews.title: "Factory Unlocked"? Nope, not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for great price, however... It was not "factory unlocked"... it wasn't unlocked at all. I had to ask the seller to obtain the AT&T unlock code, and then had to get a PUK code from T-Mobile to unblock it on their network.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device!! 5" is big enough to fit pocket and provide you a clear view when browsing the internet. Only difference between 830 and 930 is that 830 has a 10 mega pixel camera and 930 has a 20 mega pixel. However, difference in price, at Amazon, was U$100,00. SO I settle for 10 mega pixel.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: great phone.Seller RM-Model is different.
customer_reviews.text: The phone overall is great. In love Windows phone and this one has amazing camera with all the apps I love. It also has this amazing text identifier feature which is great!! The only disappointment is the sold RM version is different from the actual store configuration and this is not stated clearly. May be that is why the price difference but wish it was listed.
customer_reviews.author: Hiru

customer_reviews.title: Does not support 4G or LTE bands on AT&T. Get the U.S. version if you plan to use it in the United States.
customer_reviews.text: Does not support 4G or LTE bands on AT&T. Drains the battery super fast during phone calls (searching for network). Not good for use on AT&T networks in the United States.
customer_reviews.author: rdaneel

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good phone. i'm using Windows Phone since begining of 2014 and this is my third WP device. Camera is awesome also the performance in general. The only CON i found on this phone is that the screen is not so good as Lumia 925 or 920.
customer_reviews.author: Nefi P.

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He is a nokia guy, prefers windows to apple. His phone was dropped on the stone path so he needed a new one. He says the camera is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hillcountrynell

customer_reviews.title: Windows on the World
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a Lumina windows phone for good looks and great performance! I use it with a low cost service provider that uses the ATT Network and performance is excellent. Don't know why more Apple users aren't switching for a much better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: ... - my 920 in my opinion had a much better camera - But it has many advantages over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera is not as I expected it to be - my 920 in my opinion had a much better camera - But it has many advantages over the 920 LIKE NO OVERHEATING!!! Overall am happy tho
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Commissiong

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone worth considering
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade for me. Pros: You can add up to a 128 mini SD card giving you memory for music, pictures and video Fast and responsive phone for everything I've used Nice camera makes for some crisp pictures and great for video apps like Skype Cons: No LTE with T-Mobile but I knew that going in
customer_reviews.author: Alan DAvanzo

customer_reviews.title: AT&T does not support 4G or LTE or Secure Payments for this version of the Lumia
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the phone is solid! Unfortunately AT&T does not support this model for 4G or LTE, nor do they support secure payment apps for this phone. Although the phone supports said features, AT&T will not support them unless the phone is locked to the AT&T network and branded. This is extremely disappointing as the international version is over $100 less than a branded phone tied to the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: so-cal

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise this is a great phone with lots of hardware features
customer_reviews.text: If you are upgrading from the Lumina 600 or 500 series, battery life is ~30% to ~50% less. The lack of 4G on some carrier networks may impact you more than expected. Otherwise this is a great phone with lots of hardware features, additional value add from Billy and a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Myron M.

customer_reviews.title: If you like Windows Phone you'll like it fine
customer_reviews.text: If you like Windows Phone you'll like it fine. Great so far no issues and does what it's supposed to. Only gives H+ in USA. Read about it first.
customer_reviews.author: C Harper

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not even one year of having this phone and the three touch buttons to the bottom don't function. I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: S.J

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. I am very satisfied with the phone. It works perfectly with Cricket Wireless (AT@T) and it is a very good looking phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with high resolution and quality
customer_reviews.text: This Nokia Lumia 830 GSM Smartphone, Black - AT&T. Is A Great phone with high resolution and quality
customer_reviews.author: OZO

customer_reviews.title: better that the andriod and the IOS
customer_reviews.text: better that the andriod and the IOS, only because don't have too much apps, but this cell phone is for the productivity, for for lost the time.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my husband and I both got this phone and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Marin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone but camera stop work after 3 days and showing went wrong I can't figure what went wrong
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. ;) However (to whom it corresponds), please be sure to properly update delivery status next time. Cheerio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone with one problem. The camera. The camera is the whole reason I bought the phone since Lumias are famous for them. For some reason it would not focus. I tried factory reseting the phone and updated it like 5 times. I then called Microsoft and they told me it must be a hardware malfunction. Not very happy. Besides that, it's a great phone but the app store is a little bare. (No Snapchat or pokemon go)
customer_reviews.author: Sally 89

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It is very easy to use and trouble shooting is a breeze. Every day I learn something new 📱
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Great camera, fast internet, and excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Tamiam

customer_reviews.title: BB to Nokia
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this phone. I was one of the last bb users and refused to follow the masses to iPhone. Happy I held out for Nokia MS. It was an easy transition and was able to move my fotos, texts and music from bb via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it love it. It is a great phone
customer_reviews.author: Pablo V.

customer_reviews.title: just like what the add offerd
customer_reviews.text: Grest product... on time.... just like what the add offerd....
customer_reviews.author: Nakary Segovia

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 830 GSM Smartphone, Black - AT&T - No Warranty
product_meta.description: In addition to all of the benefits brought to you by the Lumia 830 LTE smartphone, this version also supports Power Mat Wireless Charging. Locked to AT&T Wireless. No warranty.
feature_bullets: CPU: Quad-core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A7 GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, Beidou.
This phone works only with the AT&T network and comes with a pre-installed nano SIM card.
Internal Memory: 16 GB, 1 GB RAM AT&T retail sealed Packaging phone color is gray with an optional green back door included.
Display: 720 x 1280 pixels, 5.0 inches (~294 ppi pixel density).
